items.name: chapter-intro
items.title: 8-bit Chapter Intro
items.description: A cinematic chapter/level intro with pixel art background.

items.name: resizable
items.title: 8-bit Resizable Panel
items.description: Accessible resizable panel groups and layouts with keyboard support.

items.name: enemy-health-display
items.title: 8-bit Enemy Health Display
items.description: A retro-styled enemy health display component with health bar, name, and level

items.name: login-form-with-image
items.title: 8-bit Login Form with Image
items.description: A simple 8-bit login form component with image

items.name: chart-area-step
items.title: 8-bit Chart Area Step
items.description: A simple 8-bit chart area step component

items.name: difficulty-select
items.title: 8-bit Difficulty Select
items.description: A reusable 8-bit difficulty selector with Easy, Normal, Hard.

items.name: leaderboard
items.title: 8-bit Leaderboard
items.description: A retro-styled leaderboard component for displaying player rankings with avatars and scores.

items.name: player-profile-card
items.title: 8-bit Player Profile Card
items.description: A comprehensive player profile card component with stats, health/mana bars, and custom stats support.

items.name: quest-log
items.title: 8-bit Quest Log
items.description: A retro-styled quest log component for tracking game missions and tasks with accordion functionality and status indicators.

items.name: dashboard-01
items.title: 8-bit Dashboard 01
items.description: A complete 8-bit styled dashboard with sidebar navigation, stats cards, charts, and data table with drag-and-drop functionality.
